keyVocabulary.en: keep up with / keep pace with

step3_structure.title: Step 3: Choose structure

keyVocabulary.en: working for a company / being an employee

step3_structure.title: Step 3: Choose structure
step3_structure.formula: S + prefer + V-ing/N + to + V-ing/N + because + S + V + adj

step4_finalAnswer.title: Step 4: Final answer
step4_finalAnswer.basic: Many people prefer freelancing to being an employee because they want more independence.
